overview:
SunImpex,A Middle East Exporter,offers Fresh Fruit,Vegetable,Herbs,Processed Fruit like fruit Juice concentrates,pulps purees of finest quality to the Buyers.

We offer to the world market, a wide range of agro products. The Products that we provide are:

Agro Products:

Fresh Fruits: Fresh Passion Fruit, Fresh Pineapple , Fresh Mango , Fresh Pomegranate, Fresh Guava , Fresh Apple , Fresh Lemon , Fresh Papaya, Fresh Orange , Fresh Red Grapes , Fresh Kiwi , Fresh Tomato , Fresh Banana, Fresh Pear, Fresh Apricot , Fresh Peach , Fresh Grapes (Black), Fresh Grapes (Green), Fresh Sapota, Fresh Watermelon.

Fruit Juice Concentrate: Passion Fruit Juice Concentrate, Pineapple Juice Concentrate, Clarified Mango Juice Concentrate, Clarified Pomegranate Juice Concentrate, Cloudy Pomegranate Juice Concentrate, Clarified Guava Juice Concentrate, Apple Juice Concentrate, Lemon Juice Concentrate, Orange Juice Concentrate, Red Grapes Juice Concentrate, Kiwi Juice Concentrate.

Fresh Vegetables: Fresh Potato, Fresh Onion, Fresh Tomato, Fresh Chilly, Fresh Bitter gourd, Fresh Capsicum, Fresh Cucumber, Fresh Drumstick, Fresh Pumpkin, Fresh Ginger, Fresh Turmeric, Fresh Lemon, Fresh Okra, Fresh Curry leaf, Fresh Snake gourd, Fresh Elephant Yam

Fruit Puree Concentrate: Totapuri Mango Puree Concentrate,Guava Puree Concentrate, Red/Yellow Papaya Puree Concentrate

Fruit Pulps and Purees :Totapuri Mango Pulp,Alphonso Mango Pulp,Kesar Mango Pulp,Pineapple Pulp,Passion Fruit Pulp,White / Pink Guava Fruit Pulp,Red / Yellow Papaya Pulp, Tomato Puree, Banana Puree, Tomato Paste, Pear Puree, Apricot Puree, Peach Puree, Kiwi Puree.

Spices and Herbs:- Coriander, Dill, Basil, Thyme and Mint etc
